title: Nemuri Otoko to Koi Otoko
sinopse:
A collection of stories.

1-2. Nemuri Otoko to Koi Otoko (A sleeping man and a loving man) 3. Yasashii Dinner (Sweet dinner) 4. Yoru wo Nigeru (Run from the night) 5. Taiyou to Himitsu (Sun and secrets) 6. Matsu Hana (A waiting flower) 7. Nemuri Otoko to Koi Sonogo (A sleeping man and a loving man -epilogue-)
